p: However, this index is only an indicator of the beginning of oxidation. These phenomena are generally favored by high levels of unsaturated fatty acids which may constitute in some oils more than 80% of their mass, which is the case of soybean oil (48â€“59% linoleic acid, 17 to 30% oleic acid and 4.5 to 11% linolenic acid (Codex Alimentarius).
